title: Week 3 Recap (improved quality of play, best team in league?) 9/25/17
description:
Nick Kostos, Will Brinson and Pete Prisco start this episode highlighting the increased quality of play and entertainment value across the league in Week 3 (:39).  The guys ask if the Falcons are the best team in football (7:25), if the Bengals are done (11:29), and if Ben McAdoo is on the hot seat (14:35). Next, analysis on the Patriots surviving a scare (27:41) and Pittsburgh's early struggles (30:48). Jason La Canfora joins the conversation (34:55) to discuss protests during the national anthem (35:35), the Broncos suffering their first loss of the season (41:03), and who performed the worst on Sunday (43:45).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:subtitle: Nick Kostos, Will Brinson, Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora discuss all things Week 3 in the NFL, including better quality of play, who's the best, and who performed the worst.
